title: Is We Dumb? | Beef Jerky. Whale. Dishwasher. Swamp Thing.
description:
Would you attend church more often if they offered various flavors of communion wafers and dipping sauces? Probably! Let's talk about that, one of the wildest getting lost while drunk stories, why making fun of your kids is good for them, a cop that hulked up and lifted a flipped vehicle by himself, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

*** IS WE DUMB? LIVE!!! | JUNE 10TH | TICKETS AT http://badmagicmerch.com ***

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/z1p-21aGAnw
